title: Bluey: Perfect
description: It's Father's Day! As Bluey and Bingo make cards for Dad, will Bluey learn that sometimes perfect doesn't have to be . . . perfect?A gorgeous eBook for kids of all ages.Bluey is an award-winning preschool show about Bluey, a blue heeler pup, and her family. Airing on ABC KIDS, the show has amassed legions of dedicated fans and hugely popular ranges of books, toys, clothes, games and more.
author: Bluey
